meanings.sent1: The metal pieces were weldable, so the welder easily joined them together.
meanings.sent2: The weldable material allowed for a strong bond between the two parts.
meanings.sent3: The robot thought it was weldable, but it turned out it was made of plastic!
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like weldable steel, unbreakable and enduring.
meanings.sent5: The idea was as clear and simple as a weldable connection.

meanings.sent1: The weldable rods were perfect for the project.
meanings.sent2: The weldable surface made the repair job much easier.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that even the spaghetti looked weldable today!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and inviting as a weldable welcome sign.
meanings.sent5: The instructions were as straightforward as using a weldable material.
